meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of the acrosome.
meanings.sent1: The acrosomal part of the sperm helps in fertilization.
meanings.sent2: The acrosomal enzymes aid in breaking down the egg's protective layer.
meanings.sent3: The acrosomal hero sperm saved the day by reaching the egg first.
meanings.sent4: His acrosomal determination to succeed propelled him forward.
meanings.sent5: The acrosomal characteristics of the sperm make it specialized for its mission.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the acrosome of a sperm cell.
meanings.sent1: The acrosomal region of the sperm contains important enzymes.
meanings.sent2: Acrosomal proteins play a crucial role in fertilization.
meanings.sent3: The acrosomal party in the sperm cell was where all the action happened.
meanings.sent4: Her acrosomal touch seemed to magically open the door to new possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The acrosomal structure of the sperm head is essential for successful reproduction.
